version_description:
- Stability improvements and bug fixes
- Reduced and removed some ads
bug fixes
minor bug fixes

Bug fixes,
New updates coming soon, stay tuned
bug fixes

UI Changes:
- Cleaner and simpler  UI/UX,
- Settings has been removed from tabbar and can be found in the top right corner,
- Flatter more modern look,
- Improvements for future updates

Other Updates:
- Updates and Improvements for future updates
- Minor bug fixes

NEW:
* Upcoming view, with information about upcoming original shows release dates.
* NEW Trailers view, with popular trailers and teasers for upcoming and past original releases.

IMPROVED:
* Faster Searching
* Fixed bugs
Bug fixes

New:
 - New ‘Discover’ view to replace browse, quickly discover new, popular and trending shows and movies
 - New ‘Videos’ view, browse and watch new, popular and trending trailers and episode clips.

Updated: 
 - New and improved iPad interface
 - Minor bug fixes
 - Improvements to upcoming feed.

* Added support for iOS 13 including dark mode support
* Improved video playback
* Bug fixes
Minor bug fixes

- Added number of favourites for a show or movie to items in the upcoming feed,
- Improved error handling so app should be more reliable,
- Minor UI tweaks,
- Performance improvements,
- Bug fixes

* New Home view to quickly see new, popular, trending and new shows coming soon,
* Updated Favourites to show a customised content from all your favourites,
* New bar chat to show rating of each episode,
* Bug fixes and improvements.
Minor bug fixes

I've been doing lots of background work to improve notifications, so I've added new settings page to fully customise app push notifications.
I've also done a few small quality of life bug fixes.

Thanks for all your feedback.
Fix for issue with video playback.
Added support to clear all notifications and minor bug fixes.

* Added new episode details page.
* Minor bug fixes for a number of app crashes.

New in this update:
* New notifications settings page - Full custom control over all notification types.
* New actor profile page, with more details - Follow your favourite actors.
* Search for Actors - Even search by their character names.
* Added main language to media details page.
* Added show or movie indicator to all posters.

Also minor bug fixes.
Added new status badge to media details, and a few minor bug fixes.
Fix issue where profile details page may incorrectly show Pro as purchased even when not purchased, and minor bug fixes and improvements.

* Add Popular actors page - quickly find out who is trending.
* Minor background improvements and bug fixes
Home page UI improvements and bug fixes

Redesigned details and seasons pages to make it easier to keep track of your current binge watch.
Redesigned cast and crew pages to have a better breakdown of their credits.
Add and improve ratings charts.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Minor bug fixes
minor bug fix
